Audio.description: A section of the request body that specifies the audio parameters.

Container.description: The container type for the output file. Valid values include flac, flv, fmp4, gif, mp3, mp4, mpg, mxf, oga, ogg, ts, and webm.

Name.description: The name of the preset. We recommend that the name be unique within the AWS account, but uniqueness is not enforced.

Thumbnails.description: A section of the request body that specifies the thumbnail parameters, if any.

Video.description: A section of the request body that specifies the video parameters.
